meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ferris Fletcher Don Smolen Dave Osborne Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2080.

td.p: Ferris Fletcher, a psychologist originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Don Smolen, a securities trader from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Dave Osborne, a television production assistant from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $10,400)

tr.td: TV ROLES
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
STORMS
RED-LETTER DAYS
OKLAHOMA

Don

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [in reaction to Dave\'s response] Well, you realize that you have placed us in a terrible position because there are so many members of the Kennedy family and your lack of specificity is going to cost you.)
DonWho is Rose Kennedy
$3,400
DaveWho is Kennedy
$5,299
FerrisWho is Courteney Kennedy?
$600
Jean Kennedy Smith')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'On St. Patrick\'s Day in 1993, she was appointed ambassador to Ireland')

tr.td: IN THE NEWS
On St. Patrick's Day in 1993, she was appointed ambassador to Ireland
Dave
Don
Ferris
3rd place: Service Merchandise gift certificate & Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune for SNES and Sega Genesis
2nd place: trip on Delta to Washington, D.C. & stay at Loews L'Enfant Plaza
New champion: $10,800
Dave
Don
Ferris

14 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

21 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
